view_definition_query: select noti.read, noti.date, noti.idnotification, noti.idaccounts, noti.idslumptests, slt.value, slt.idprojects, supp.idsuppliers, supp.name as suppliername, comp.idcompositions, comp.name as compositionname, comp.tholdmax, comp.tholdmin, prj.name as projectname, noti.type, noti.predictedvalue from mass.notifications as noti left join mass.slumptests as slt on slt.idslumptests = noti.idslumptests left join mass.projects as prj on prj.idprojects = slt.idprojects left join mass.suppliers as supp on supp.idsuppliers = slt.idsuppliers left join mass.compositions as comp on comp.idcompositions = slt.idcompositions
